725167f-a.title: Queens: 28th Avenue - Union Street
725167f-a.text:
28th Avenue, north side, between Cnion Street and Parsons
Boulevard, showing the Mitchell mansion. In 1891 and 1909 it
stood on land occupying 63 acres on the east side of Whitestone
Avenue (later Union Street), bounded on the south by Bayside and
on the north by Higgins Lane. 28th Avenue, when cut through, will
run along the line of the fence.
P. L. Sperr  April 13, 1927
NO REPRODUCTIONS
